item.description:
Hi,

Let's go ice skating at Simoni ice skating rink in Cambridge.  It's $5.00 to skate, and if you don't have your own skates there is a $4.00 rental fee.  We'll meet at 1:00 p.m. in front of the rink or inside if the weather is bad  (Sunday pubic skating is 1:00-3:00 p.m. this year.)  I've run this event for the past two years and we always gather afterward at the East Side Bar & Grille for food and drink which is close by and delicious.  Closest T stop is Lechmere on the green line at First Street, so about a 6 block walk. There are also buses that travel down this street. If you are driving, the rink has a parking lot. It's also located next to Twin City Plaza on McGrath/O'Brien Highway.  This is a joint event with the Social Fun Meetup.

As always, if your plans change, please update your RSVP. If you have any questions, let me know.

Dee
item.how_to_find_us: Outside in front of the rink if nice/inside lobby if weather is bad
item.name: Indoor ice skate in Cambridge
